resources.string: Welcome to Mobile OCR. Tap and hold the screen for instructions.
Welcome to Mobile OCR. Please make sure you can connect to the internet.
Fling up or down to change modes. Tap to play or pause current text. Fling left and right to navigate text. Double tap to play continuously. Tap and hold to repeat the instructions
Currently in picture taking mode. Use the camera to take a picture.
There was an error in connecting to the WeOCR servers. Please try again or wait for the server to become available.
There was an error in talking to the Mobile OCR servers. Please try again or wait for the server to become available.
